preqs: ECE2021 (or ECE3202 or PHS2022) and ECE2041 (or ECE3402)

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ECE2021, ECE3202, PHS2022} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ECE2041, ECE3402})
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-ELEC, MAEELEC01} Otherwise true

description: Students will study the characteristics of key components that make up optical communications systems, including: lasers and advanced lightwave sources and direct modulation, optical modulators, optical fibres, optical amplifiers, filters and multiplexers, optical receivers and associated electronics. Secondly, students will use this knowledge to analyse and design optical communications systems. Examples will include local-area networks, metropolitan area networks, long-haul links and transcontinental networks.
